title: Next Page

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "turn the page" onto the switch.
• Let the switch user choose a book they would like to read.
• Read the book aloud, pausing at the end of each page to prompt the switch user to press their switch to "turn the page."
• If the switch user presses their switch before you finish reading the page, still turn the page. This helps them learn that pressing the switch has an effect on the activity.

tooltipText: Activate the switch to turn the page of a book
